title: The Queen's Gambit
description: You are the queen in the most critical position of the game. You can sacrifice yourself for a brilliant mate, or play conservatively to maintain advantage. The collective wisdom has never seen this exact position - will you trust your own judgment?
background: Queen sacrifices are the rarest and most beautiful moves in chess. This position is unique - the collective wisdom has no precedent. You must rely on your own calculation and intuition.

consequences.choiceA: Spectacular queen sacrifice that leads to checkmate
consequences.choiceB: Solid move that maintains advantage but may miss the win

godMove.reasoning: This unique position requires the queen sacrifice for mate
